More Trading SecretsLazyTraders Here are some of the things you can do to give yourself the best possible tools to be successful in todays Markets Internet Connection Make sure you get the fastest Internet Connection possible Get a Cable Modem or DSL for per month Use the fastest possible Execution System to execute your orders We recommend because they only charge to trade shares Money needed to open an account is You can open an account with them from anywhere in the world EXCEPT from Canada If you do not have you can open an account for as low as with but be prepared that your execution times can be slower You can open an account with them from anywhere in the world EXCEPT from Canada Wear Blinders when trading Do not subscribe to different quote and news services because it will distract you Use one or two Quote and News services Realtime of course and stick with them Do not trade on negative days when you are a beginner There is still money to be made on negative days but it is easier to ride a positive wave Find a Trading System that works Dont start trading without any kind of System because your emotions will get you You can now trade from AM EST until PM EST and before and after market trades are sometimes more profitable than regular trades The Lazy DayTrader System will teach you how to trade profitably assuming you know nothing about Day Trading Michael
